title: Identification
fullText:
All devices used for isolation shall be clearly identified to indicate the circuit or equipment that they isolate.
NOTE: This may be achieved by marking or, in the case of isolation of a single item of equipment, location of the device.
A switch that is marked with the following symbol, in accordance with the relevant Standard, is deemed to be suitable for isolation:

Relevant product Standards with requirements and tests for isolation include AS/NZS 3111, AS/NZS 3133, AS/NZS IEC 60947.2, AS/NZS IEC 60947.3, AS/NZS 60898.1, AS/NZS 61008.1 and AS/NZS 61009.1.
NOTE: Symbols used in this Standard are listed in Appendix J.
